meaning: you know what it is boi
to lay (an egg); to give birth
to eat/drink (hon. of 食べる・飲む)
to come/go (hum. (courteous) of 行く・来る)
all; entire (NB: only for inanimate objects) (cf. 全員)
to seat oneself (lit. "to arrive at a seat")
to be hungry (more polite, note reading change)
to stay (ie: hotel, 旅館 for a short time)
to treat (someone to food/drink) (don't use to superiors)
to get off 〜; to get out of (a vehicle)
